reviews.review: Prof. Joublot-Ferré is a great teacher. She is very accommodating and understanding, always willing to offer further explanation and give detailed feedback on assignments. She was my professor for 204 as well and was super helpful in that class, too.
She is a great professor and person! She wants everyone to do well and is super accommodating. She listens and collaborates with her students and makes it easy to participate and stay engaged.

name: FREN250
title: Introduction to Cultural and Textual Analysis
description: Prerequisite: FREN204; or students who have taken courses with comparable content may contact the department. Restriction: Must not be a native/fluent speaker of French. Credit only granted for: FREN250 or FREN250H. Introduction to cultural and textual analysis of selected readings from various genres in French literature. Taught in French. Cross-listed with FREN250H. Credit granted for FREN250 or FREN250H.
